```{=html}
<a class="{{< meta button-component.class >}}"
  href="{{< meta button-component.url >}}"
  role="button"
  data-component="{{< meta button-component.component >}}"
  data-modifier="{{< meta button-component.modifier >}}"
  data-module="{{< meta button-component.module >}}"
  >{{< meta button-component.text >}}</a
>
```
